> âš ï¸ **Important Note for Contributors:** Quillpad is relied upon by thousands of users to safely store their important notes and ideas. It is critical that new changes do not corrupt or damage user data. Because carefully reviewing Pull Requests to prevent regressions takes significant time and effort, **please do not open a PR without thoroughly reviewing and testing your own code changes first.**
> 
> **ðŸ¤– AI Assisted Code & Vibe Coding:** We welcome contributions that are "vibe coded" or aided by AI! However, to ensure the quality and safety of the project, please make sure:
> - The code is properly tested and no regressions are introduced.
> - You have a good understanding of Kotlin and can explain and maintain the generated code if needed.

## Description
<!-- Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed. Please also include relevant motivation and context. -->

## Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Refactoring / Cleanup
- [ ] Translation / Documentation update

## Checklist:
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (we use `.editorconfig`)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works (if applicable)
